personalInformation.summary: I am a highly enthusiastic, self motivated, skilled and hardworking customer service oriented professional, seeking a position as a costumer service representative in your company in order to contribute my organization, problem solving and strong communication skills to ensure customer satisfaction.
personalInformation.title: VOLUNTEER FRONT DESK RECEPTIONIST, CANTEEN WORKER
